1.title: Albuquerque Comic Expo 2012

episode of.title: Talk Nerdy to Me the Show (TV Series 2012– )

1.plot: The Talk Nerdy to Me crew hits the floors at ACE 2012! They cover panels from Stan Lee, Billy Dee Williams, meet Adam Baldwin, Floyd Kaufman, Wilce Portacio, and more.

2.title: Kaboom Goes the Dynamite

episode of.title: Talk Nerdy to Me the Show (TV Series 2012– )

2.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

imdb.plot outline: AJ Bitner and Pablo Gunner, along with the Talk Nerdy to Me team go around New Mexico and check out all the coolest comic and game shops, along with nerdy activities that everyone can enjoy. Using Kaboom Test Labs as their home base, the team goes out to prove that New Mexico is the nerdiest state in the country!
imdb.title: Talk Nerdy to Me the Show
akas: Talk Nerdy to Me the Show (United States)
plot: AJ Bitner, Pablo Gunner, and the Talk Nerdy to Me team go throughout Albuquerque showing the nerdy side that few know about.::Steven Blacksmith

AJ Bitner and Pablo Gunner, along with the Talk Nerdy to Me team go around New Mexico and check out all the coolest comic and game shops, along with nerdy activities that everyone can enjoy. Using Kaboom Test Labs as their home base, the team goes out to prove that New Mexico is the nerdiest state in the country!::Steven Blacksmith
